title: Group
description: A regular old node with no other behavior. Useful for grouping things together under one parent.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identifier for the node.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of the node in 3D space.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: The rotation of the node in 3D space.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: The scale of the node in 3D space.

snippets.name: Create Group
snippets.description: Create a Group node with default settings.
